T02vadhdhgu:1: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasamaye bhagavān kauśāmbyāṃ viharati sma /
T02vadhdhgu:2: kaṇṭakasaṃjñake mahāvanavare mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ sarvabuddhadharmaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ
T02vadhdhgu:3: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kauśāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
T02vadhdhgu:5: śrāddho mahāśrāddhaḥ sa yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau
T02vadhdhgu:6: śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣaṇīkṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdat*
T02vadhdhgu:7: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat*
T02vadhdhgu:8: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kaṃcit pradeśaṃ praṣṭuṃ /
T02vadhdhgu:9: sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya //
T02vadhdhgu:10: evam ukte bhagavān sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat* pṛccha tvaṃ gṛhapate yad yad evākāṃkṣasy ahaṃ te yathāpṛṣṭena [GBM 1427(fol. 35v)
T02vadhdhgu:12: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daridro bhūtvā adaridro bhavati vyādhitaś ca bhūtvā avyādhito bhavati //
T02vadhdhgu:13: atha khalu bhagavāṃ jānann eva sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat* kim iti tvaṃ gṛhapate adaridratāyā praśnaṃ pṛcchasi //
T02vadhdhgu:14: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat* daridro 'haṃ bhagavan bahupoṣyo
T02vadhdhgu:15: bahuputro bahuduhitrikas tad deśayatu bhagavāṃs taṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yena daridrāḥ
T02vadhdhgu:16: satvā adaridrā bhaveyuḥ bahudhanadhānyakośakoṣṭāgārasaṃpannāś ca bhaveyuḥ pṛyā manāpā
T02vadhdhgu:19: evam ukte bhagavāṃ sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat* bhūtapūrvaṃ gṛhapate atīta
T02vadhdhgu:20: GBM 1286(fol. (36)r)1 /// samayena bhagavāṃ vajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho ///
T02vadhdhgu:21: 2 /// myasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāṃ tasya tathāgatasyāntikā .. ///
T02vadhdhgu:22: 3 /// tā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakā .. ///
T02vadhdhgu:26: 5 /// .. ṭhayanti / evaṃ kuṃbhāṇḍā austārakā pūtanā kaṭapūtanā yātudhānā na + + ///
T02vadhdhgu:27: 6 /// hārā rasāhārā jātāhārā syandanikāhārā na viheṭhayanti /
T02vadhdhgu:31: dhāritā anumoditā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśi
T02vadhdhgu:35: 3 /// ardharātres tridhā vā caturvārān asya devatā āttamanaskā svayam āgamya dhānyavṛṣṭiṃ pāta
T02vadhdhgu:68: iyaṃ sā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇī asyā dhāraṇyānubhāvena rogadurbhikṣamarakāntārādayo
T02vadhdhgu:69: na prabhavanti yas tu gṛhapate imāni vasudhārādhāraṇīmantrapadāni tathāgatānām arhatānāṃ
T02vadhdhgu:70: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ekarātram āvartaye tasya mahāpuruṣamātrayā dhārayā
T02vadhdhgu:73: sarvadhānyaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sarvopadravāṃś ca nāśayati tena hi tvaṃ gṛhapate udgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārādhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya /
T02vadhdhgu:75: tat te bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāyeti sādhu bhagavann iti /
T02vadhdhgu:76: sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavato 'ntikād imāṃ vasudhārādhāraṇīṃ śrutvā hṛṣṭas tuṣṭa udagra
T02vadhdhgu:77: āttamanā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataś caraṇayor nipatya bhagavantam
T02vadhdhgu:78: etad avocat* udgṛhītā me vasudhārādhāraṇī prahvīkṛtā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā idānīṃ
T02vadhdhgu:80: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ punar anavalokya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ
T02vadhdhgu:81: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
T02vadhdhgu:82: gaccha tvam ānanda sucandragṛhapater niveśanaṃ gatvā cākāraṃ paśya paripūrṇaṃ dhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ ratnasamṛddhaṃ ca /
T02vadhdhgu:84: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ sucandrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
T02vadhdhgu:85: bhagavantam etad avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena sucandro gṛhapatir mahādhano
T02vadhdhgu:88: śrāddhaḥ ānanda sucandro gṛhapatiḥ paramaśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayo dhāritā cānena vasudhārādhāraṇī pravartitā udgṛhītā vācitā /
T02vadhdhgu:90: tena hy ānanda tvam udgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārādhāraṇīṃ dhāraya grāhaya /
T02vadhdhgu:94: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ /
T02vadhdhgu:95: nāham ānanda samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ /
T02vadhdhgu:98: tat kasya hetoḥ abhedyā hy ete ānanda dhāraṇīmantrapadāni na caiṣā kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ satvānāṃ śrutipatham apy āgamiṣyati kaḥ punar vādo pustagatā vā hṛdayagatā dhāritā vā /
T02vadhdhgu:99: tat kasya hetoḥ sarvatathāgatānām eṣā vākyaṃ sarvatathāgatair eṣā dhāraṇī bhāṣitā adhiṣṭhitā /
T02vadhdhgu:100: dharmamudrayā mudritā anumoditā prakāśitā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitārocitā vivṛtottānīkṛtā
T02vadhdhgu:101: ākhyātā sarvasatvānāṃ daridrāṇāṃ vyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ sarvabhayopadrutānāṃ satvānām arthāyeti /
T02vadhdhgu:103: udgṛhītā me bhagavaṃn iyaṃ vasudhārādhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā /
T02vadhdhgu:105: ity athāyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanāt tasyāṃ velāyāṃ kṛtakarapuṭo evam udānam udānayati sma //
